Articles.Content:
In the future, when my Duna mission are complete, i want to do a NASA HAVOC style Eve mission, with the inflatable airship and all, but i cant find a mod lthat can do something like it. the hooligan labs airshis are what i need, but the large ones look sort of ugly and aren't inflatable, an the inflatable ones don't fit the "Blimp" job description. Can one of you coding/modeling geniuses create something like the HAVOC airship? Thanks.

The reference ^

Procedural Airships

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99132-0-90-Procedural-Airships-1-3-dec-20th-2014

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/102502-0-90-Sounding-Rockets%21-Start-small-Dream-big%21-0-1-1-2014-12-24?p=1707766&viewfull=1#post1707766

(Probably the second one is just for small VeGa-style blimps

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vega_program

)

(Probably the second one is just for small VeGa-style blimps

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vega_program

)

I am talking about ones that are inflatable, but i'll look into them.
Try this one it's alittle more like that Hooligan-Labs http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53961-0-22-Hooligan-Labs-%28now-under-new-managment%29-Featuring-Airships-Subs-and-more
